title: Exporting Records
body:
Exporting Records¶

Note

When a user needs to export a collection of data, they should export the records.

Users should navigate to the page that contains the records they wish to export using the <i class=”fa fa-bars”></i> menu icon in the ribbon.

  1. Click the <i class=”fa fa-download”></i> export icon located near the upper right hand corner of the page

  2. All data is automatically selected to be exported. A user can individually deselect by clicking the <i class=”fa fa-check-square-o”></i> blue check mark before the column type, or click mass deselect and click the columns desired

  3. Select an export format

  4. Select an export

  5. Select an export strategy

    • Download the export file. This will allow the user to have a copy that can be shared later on when needed

    • Email the export file to the email associated with the user

    • Email the export file to another user. Use this option to send the export to another user on the platform

    • Email the export file to email address. Use this option to send the export to someone not on the platform

  6. Click Export
